RPETools.name: RPETools
RPETools.description:
Data persistence & logging utility for IBM Rational® Publishing Engine™.
Use in conjunction with RPE Persistence Server from Reportable Systems.

Copyright 2012, ReportableSystems.com
http://www.reportablesystems.com

NO WARRANTY EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

Storage.name: Storage
Storage.description: The Storage class is used to persist variables across multiple RPE templates.

Logger.name: Logger
Logger.description: The Logger class is used to manage publishing logs for non-trivial RPE templates.

classitems.description:
A minified version of Douglas Crockford's JSON library, for JS serialization.
See https://github.com/douglascrockford/JSON-js/blob/master/json2.js
classitems.name: JSON

classitems.description: The hostname or IP address of the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: host

classitems.description: The port number of the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: port

classitems.description: The base URI for communicating with the RPE Persistence Server service.
classitems.name: serviceURI

classitems.description: Invokes an HTTP GET request using Mozilla Rhino / Java class wrapping.
classitems.name: get

return.description: The content of the HTTP response.

classitems.description: Generates a 36 character UID-like identifier String; e.g. "77a04516-18b4-5be5-12ee-4bb256ebae9e".
classitems.name: uid

classitems.description: Allocates a file using Mozilla Rhino / Java class wrapping.
classitems.name: getFile

params.name: filename
params.description: A fully-qualified filepath and filename descriptor.

classitems.description: Writes content to a file using Mozilla Rhino / Java class wrapping.
classitems.name: writeToFile

params.name: filename
params.description: A fully-qualified filepath and filename descriptor.

params.name: content
params.description: A fully-qualified filepath and filename descriptor.

params.name: append
params.description: A flag that adjusts the write mode (append to existing file, or overwrite).

classitems.description: Overrides default hostname and port configuration settings for the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: setHost

params.name: host
params.description: The IP address or hostname where the RPE Persistence Server service is running.

params.name: port
params.description: The port number that the RPE Persistence Server service is bound to.

classitems.description: Retrieves then de-serializes the content of the named variable from the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: read

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the desired stored variable.

return.description: The value of the stored variable on the RPE Persistence Server.

example:
// retrieve value of myVariable from RPE Persistence Server...
       var myVariable = RPETools.Storage.read("myVariable");

classitems.description: Serializes then stores a variable on the RPE Persistence Server; overwrites if the named variable already exists.
classitems.name: write

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the variable to store.

params.name: value
params.description: The value to be assigned to the named variable.

classitems.description: Clears all variables from the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Saves to disk an XML representation of all variables stored on the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: saveXML

params.name: filename
params.description: The target filename to which XML content is written.

return.description: An XML representation of all variables stored on the RPE Persistence Server.

classitems.description: Records (and optionally tags) a log message to the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: log

params.name: msg
params.description: The content of the log message to be stored.

params.name: tag
params.description: An optional String that can be used to identify related log messages.

return.description: A 36 character ID generated for the logged message, to use with an RPE Bookmark element.

classitems.description: Clears all log entries from the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Saves to disk an XML representation of all logged messages on the RPE Persistence Server.
classitems.name: saveXML

params.name: filename
params.description: The target filename to which XML content is written.

return.description: An XML representation of all logged messages on the RPE Persistence Server.
